history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00294
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ABOLISHING IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES AND SUCH OTHER SIMILAR OR RELATED FEES FROM BENEFICIARIES OF IRRIGATION SYSTEMS FUNDED AND CONSTRUCTED BY, OR UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3601, PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 552 AND PRESIDENTIAL DECREES NO. 1702
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Services Act.
ABSTRACT : Seeks for the abolition of the Irrigation Service Fee (ISF) collected by the National Irrigation Administration (NIA) and for a genuinely just program that will accelerate irrigation development nationwide.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P., SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Pimentel (014 2016-08-23)2. Savellano (016 2016-08-30)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
